name: LINEAR__GET_ISSUES
description: Retrieve issues from Linear with filtering options for teams, assignees, status, and labels.

query.default: query Issues($first: Int, $filter: IssueFilter) { issues(first: $first, filter: $filter) { nodes { id title description state { name } assignee { name } team { name } labels { nodes { name } } createdAt updatedAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issues

name: LINEAR__CREATE_ISSUE
description: Create a new issue in Linear with title, description, team assignment, and optional labels.

query.default: mutation IssueCreate($input: IssueCreateInput!) { issueCreate(input: $input) { success issue { id title description state { name } team { name } } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating an issue

teamId.description: Team ID to assign the issue to

assigneeId.description: User ID to assign the issue to

name: LINEAR__UPDATE_ISSUE
description: Update an existing issue in Linear with new title, description, status, or assignee.

query.default: mutation IssueUpdate($id: String!, $input: IssueUpdateInput!) { issueUpdate(id: $id, input: $input) { success issue { id title description state { name } assignee { name } } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for updating an issue

stateId.description: New state ID for the issue

name: LINEAR__DELETE_ISSUE
description: Permanently delete an issue from Linear workspace, removing it and all associated data.

query.default: mutation IssueDelete($id: String!) { issueDelete(id: $id) { success } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting an issue

name: LINEAR__GET_TEAMS
description: Retrieve teams from Linear workspace with their details and member information.

query.default: query Teams { teams { nodes { id name description key members { nodes { id name email } } states { nodes { id name type } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving teams

name: LINEAR__CREATE_TEAM
description: Create a new team in Linear workspace with name, key, description, and workflow configuration.

query.default: mutation TeamCreate($input: TeamCreateInput!) { teamCreate(input: $input) { success team { id name key description private timezone } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a team

key.description: Team key (2-5 uppercase letters for issue prefixes)

name: LINEAR__GET_PROJECTS
description: Retrieve projects from Linear with their progress, milestones, and team assignments.

query.default: query Projects($first: Int) { projects(first: $first) { nodes { id name description state progress targetDate teams { nodes { name } } issues { nodes { title state { name } } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving projects

name: LINEAR__CREATE_PROJECT
description: Create a new project in Linear with name, description, target date, and team assignments.

query.default: mutation ProjectCreate($input: ProjectCreateInput!) { projectCreate(input: $input) { success project { id name description state targetDate } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a project

teamIds.description: Array of team IDs to assign to the project

name: LINEAR__UPDATE_PROJECT
description: Update an existing project in Linear with new name, description, target date, or team assignments.

query.default: mutation ProjectUpdate($id: String!, $input: ProjectUpdateInput!) { projectUpdate(id: $id, input: $input) { success project { id name description state targetDate progress } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for updating a project

name: LINEAR__DELETE_PROJECT
description: Delete a project from Linear workspace permanently, removing it and all associated data.

query.default: mutation ProjectDelete($id: String!) { projectDelete(id: $id) { success } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting a project

name: LINEAR__GET_COMMENTS
description: Retrieve comments for a specific issue in Linear with author details and timestamps.

query.default: query Comments($issueId: String!, $first: Int) { issue(id: $issueId) { comments(first: $first) { nodes { id body user { name email } createdAt updatedAt } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issue comments

issueId.description: Issue ID to get comments for

name: LINEAR__CREATE_COMMENT
description: Create a comment on an issue in Linear to facilitate team discussion and collaboration.

query.default: mutation CommentCreate($input: CommentCreateInput!) { commentCreate(input: $input) { success comment { id body user { name } createdAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a comment

name: LINEAR__UPDATE_COMMENT
description: Update an existing comment on an issue in Linear with new text content.

query.default: mutation CommentUpdate($id: String!, $input: CommentUpdateInput!) { commentUpdate(id: $id, input: $input) { success comment { id body updatedAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for updating a comment

name: LINEAR__DELETE_COMMENT
description: Delete a comment from an issue in Linear permanently, removing it from the discussion thread.

query.default: mutation CommentDelete($id: String!) { commentDelete(id: $id) { success } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting a comment

name: LINEAR__GET_LABELS
description: Retrieve labels from Linear workspace for categorizing and organizing issues.

query.default: query IssueLabels($first: Int) { issueLabels(first: $first) { nodes { id name color description team { name } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issue labels

name: LINEAR__CREATE_LABEL
description: Create a new label in Linear for categorizing and organizing issues with custom color and description.

query.default: mutation IssueLabelCreate($input: IssueLabelCreateInput!) { issueLabelCreate(input: $input) { success issueLabel { id name color description } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a label

color.description: Hex color code for the label

teamId.description: Team ID to assign the label to

name: LINEAR__ADD_ISSUE_LABELS
description: Add labels to an existing issue in Linear for better categorization and filtering.

query.default: mutation IssueUpdate($id: String!, $input: IssueUpdateInput!) { issueUpdate(id: $id, input: $input) { success issue { id title labels { nodes { name color } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for adding labels to an issue

id.description: Issue ID to add labels to

labelIds.description: Array of label IDs to add to the issue

name: LINEAR__GET_CYCLES
description: Retrieve development cycles from Linear for sprint planning and iteration management.

query.default: query Cycles($first: Int, $filter: CycleFilter) { cycles(first: $first, filter: $filter) { nodes { id name description number startsAt endsAt team { name } issues { nodes { title state { name } } } progress completedAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving cycles

eq.description: Team ID to filter cycles by

name: LINEAR__CREATE_CYCLE
description: Create a new development cycle in Linear for sprint planning with start date, end date, and team assignment.

query.default: mutation CycleCreate($input: CycleCreateInput!) { cycleCreate(input: $input) { success cycle { id name description number startsAt endsAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a cycle

teamId.description: Team ID to assign the cycle to

startsAt.description: Cycle start date and time (ISO format)

endsAt.description: Cycle end date and time (ISO format)

name: LINEAR__GET_WORKFLOW_STATES
description: Retrieve workflow states from Linear teams for understanding issue progression and status tracking.

query.default: query WorkflowStates($teamId: String, $first: Int) { workflowStates(filter: { team: { id: { eq: $teamId } } }, first: $first) { nodes { id name description type position color team { name } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving workflow states

teamId.description: Team ID to filter workflow states by

first.description: Number of workflow states to retrieve

name: LINEAR__CREATE_WORKFLOW_STATE
description: Create a new workflow state in Linear team for customizing issue status progression and organization.

query.default: mutation WorkflowStateCreate($input: WorkflowStateCreateInput!) { workflowStateCreate(input: $input) { success workflowState { id name description type position } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a workflow state

teamId.description: Team ID to assign the workflow state to

color.description: Hex color code for the state

name: LINEAR__GET_USERS
description: Retrieve users from Linear workspace with their roles, teams, and activity information.

query.default: query Users($first: Int) { users(first: $first) { nodes { id name displayName email avatarUrl isMe admin active lastSeen assignedIssues { nodes { title } } teamMemberships { nodes { team { name } role } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving users

name: LINEAR__GET_MILESTONES
description: Retrieve milestones from Linear workspace with their progress, target dates, and associated projects.

query.default: query Milestones($first: Int) { milestones(first: $first) { nodes { id name description targetDate sortOrder projects { nodes { id name progress } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving milestones

name: LINEAR__CREATE_MILESTONE
description: Create a new milestone in Linear for tracking major deadlines and project goals.

query.default: mutation MilestoneCreate($input: MilestoneCreateInput!) { milestoneCreate(input: $input) { success milestone { id name description targetDate } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a milestone

name: LINEAR__SEARCH_ISSUES
description: Search for issues in Linear workspace using text queries across titles, descriptions, and comments.

query.default: query SearchIssues($query: String!, $first: Int) { issueSearch(query: $query, first: $first) { nodes { id title description identifier state { name } assignee { name } team { name } labels { nodes { name } } createdAt updatedAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for searching issues
Search query string

name: LINEAR__GET_ATTACHMENTS
description: Retrieve attachments from a specific issue in Linear including files, images, and documents.

query.default: query IssueAttachments($issueId: String!, $first: Int) { issue(id: $issueId) { attachments(first: $first) { nodes { id title url subtitle metadata sourceType creator { name } createdAt } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issue attachments

issueId.description: Issue ID to get attachments for

name: LINEAR__CREATE_ATTACHMENT
description: Create an attachment on an issue in Linear by uploading a file or linking external content.

query.default: mutation AttachmentCreate($input: AttachmentCreateInput!) { attachmentCreate(input: $input) { success attachment { id title url sourceType } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating an attachment

issueId.description: Issue ID to attach the file to

name: LINEAR__GET_ORGANIZATION_INFO
description: Retrieve organization information from Linear workspace including settings, subscription, and member count.

query.default: query Organization { organization { id name logoUrl urlKey userCount userCountLimit subscription { plan seats } createdAt } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving organization information

name: LINEAR__GET_ISSUE_RELATIONS
description: Retrieve related issues for a specific issue in Linear including blocks, duplicates, and dependencies.

query.default: query IssueRelations($issueId: String!) { issue(id: $issueId) { relations { nodes { id type issue { id title identifier state { name } } relatedIssue { id title identifier state { name } } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issue relations

issueId.description: Issue ID to get relations for

name: LINEAR__CREATE_ISSUE_RELATION
description: Create a relationship between two issues in Linear such as blocks, duplicates, or relates to dependencies.

query.default: mutation IssueRelationCreate($input: IssueRelationCreateInput!) { issueRelationCreate(input: $input) { success issueRelation { id type issue { title } relatedIssue { title } } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating an issue relation

name: LINEAR__GET_ISSUE_HISTORY
description: Retrieve the history of changes for a specific issue in Linear including status updates and field modifications.

query.default: query IssueHistory($issueId: String!, $first: Int) { issue(id: $issueId) { history(first: $first) { nodes { id createdAt actor { name } fromState { name } toState { name } fromAssignee { name } toAssignee { name } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issue history

issueId.description: Issue ID to get history for

first.description: Number of history entries to retrieve

name: LINEAR__GET_ROADMAPS
description: Retrieve roadmaps from Linear workspace for strategic planning and timeline visualization.

query.default: query Roadmaps($first: Int) { roadmaps(first: $first) { nodes { id name description createdAt creator { name } projects { nodes { id name state progress targetDate } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving roadmaps

name: LINEAR__CREATE_ROADMAP
description: Create a new roadmap in Linear for strategic planning and project timeline visualization.

query.default: mutation RoadmapCreate($input: RoadmapCreateInput!) { roadmapCreate(input: $input) { success roadmap { id name description createdAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a roadmap

name: LINEAR__GET_CUSTOM_VIEWS
description: Retrieve custom views from Linear workspace for personalized issue filtering and organization.

query.default: query CustomViews($first: Int) { customViews(first: $first) { nodes { id name description filterData team { name } creator { name } shared createdAt updatedAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving custom views

first.description: Number of custom views to retrieve

name: LINEAR__CREATE_CUSTOM_VIEW
description: Create a new custom view in Linear for personalized issue filtering, sorting, and organization.

query.default: mutation CustomViewCreate($input: CustomViewCreateInput!) { customViewCreate(input: $input) { success customView { id name description shared } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a custom view

shared.description: Whether to share the view with team members

teamId.description: Team ID to associate the view with

name: LINEAR__GET_TEAM_MEMBERSHIPS
description: Retrieve team memberships from Linear workspace showing users, roles, and team assignments.

query.default: query TeamMemberships($teamId: String, $first: Int) { teamMemberships(filter: { team: { id: { eq: $teamId } } }, first: $first) { nodes { id role user { id name email active } team { name key } owner sortOrder } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving team memberships

teamId.description: Team ID to filter memberships by

name: LINEAR__CREATE_TEAM_MEMBERSHIP
description: Add a user to a team in Linear workspace with specified role and permissions.

query.default: mutation TeamMembershipCreate($input: TeamMembershipCreateInput!) { teamMembershipCreate(input: $input) { success teamMembership { id role user { name } team { name } } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a team membership

teamId.description: Team ID to add the user to

userId.description: User ID to add to the team

name: LINEAR__GET_ISSUE_ESTIMATES
description: Retrieve estimate information for issues in Linear including story points, time estimates, and complexity.

query.default: query Issues($filter: IssueFilter, $first: Int) { issues(filter: $filter, first: $first) { nodes { id title estimate priority priorityLabel state { name } assignee { name } team { name } cycle { name number } createdAt } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving issues with estimates

name: LINEAR__UPDATE_ISSUE_ESTIMATE
description: Update the estimate for an existing issue in Linear with story points or time estimates for sprint planning.

query.default: mutation IssueUpdate($id: String!, $input: IssueUpdateInput!) { issueUpdate(id: $id, input: $input) { success issue { id title estimate priority } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for updating issue estimate

id.description: Issue ID to update estimate for

name: LINEAR__GET_WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS
description: Retrieve workspace analytics from Linear including team velocity, issue metrics, and productivity insights.

query.default: query WorkspaceAnalytics { organization { id name userCount teams { nodes { id name issueEstimationType cyclesEnabled cycleStartDay cycleDuration activeCycle { id name progress } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving workspace analytics
